String.Source: This piece of armor doesn't need to be repaired !
String.Dest: この防具の一部は修復する必要はない！

String.Source: You need first a hammer !
String.Dest: まずハンマーが必要だ！

String.Source: You don't have the required skill to get this armor repaired !
String.Dest: 防具の修復に必要なスキルを持っていない！

String.Source: You don't have the required skill to get an enchanted armor repaired !
String.Dest: 付呪された防具の修復に必要なスキルを持っていない！

String.Source: You don't have the material:
String.Dest: 素材が足りない:

String.Source: Completely Repaired:
String.Dest: 修復完了:

String.Source: You Just Improved:
String.Dest: 改善された:

String.Source: This weapon doesn't need to be repaired !
String.Dest: この武器は修復する必要はない！

String.Source: You don't have the required skill to get an enchanted weapon repaired !
String.Dest: 付呪された武器の修復に必要なスキルを持っていない！

String.Source: You don't have the required skill to get this weapon repaired !
String.Dest: 武器の修復に必要なスキルを持っていない！

String.Source: You need the material:
String.Dest: 素材が足りない:

String.Source: My hammer has broken !
String.Dest: ハンマーが壊れた！

String.Source: Sorry, Error: can't get this weapon repaired !!
String.Dest: すまない、失敗した: 武器を修復できなかった！！

String.Source: You first need a hammer !
String.Dest: まずハンマーが必要だ！

String.Source: You have to equip the broken helmet !
String.Dest: 壊れた兜の装備が必要！

String.Source: You have to equip the broken cuirass !
String.Dest: 壊れた鎧の装備が必要！

String.Source: You have to equip the broken gauntlets !
String.Dest: 壊れた篭手の装備が必要！

String.Source: You have to equip the broken boots !
String.Dest: 壊れたブーツの装備が必要！

String.Source: Sorry, Error: Can't get this armor repaired !!
String.Dest: すまない、失敗した: 防具を修復できなかった！！

String.Source: You cannot repair while fighting !
String.Dest: 戦闘中は修復できない！

String.Source: Wait a little bit...
String.Dest: 少し待ってくれ…

String.Source: You have to first equip a weapon in your left hand !
String.Dest: 最初に左手武器の装備が必要！

String.Source: You have to first equip a weapon in your right hand !
String.Dest: 最初に右手武器の装備が必要！

String.Source: You have to equip the broken shield !
String.Dest: 壊れた盾の装備が必要！
